name: test_all_status
docstring: Test whether a device can be set to maitenance/online

name: test_circuit_posting
docstring: Test whether a circuit can be sent to each device

name: test_circuit_result_response
docstring: Test whether a circuit can be sent and then its result can be retrieved, for each device.

name: test_connection
docstring: Test the connection by pinging the server

name: test_device_blocking_and_release
docstring: Test whether each device can be blocked and released

name: test_device_listing
docstring: Test the device listing call

name: test_device_selection
docstring: Test the device electability for every listed device. The offline devices are skipped.

name: test_experiment_saving_and_retrieving
docstring: Test whether a saved experiment can be sent and retrieved.

name: test_post_and_results_from_maintenance_to_online
docstring:
A Job posted in a device in maintenance mode should be able to get the results when de device goes to online.

The tests are skipped if the device is quantum or it is in status offline.
Once the tests are done, the device is returned back to its original status.

name: test_saved_experiments_listing
docstring: Test whether a saved experiment listing can be obtained

name: test_endurance
docstring:
Check there is no a degradation of service.

The same circuit is executed multiple times and  wait always the same maximum amount of time for a COMPLETED status.

name: test_can_change_device_availability
docstring: Ensure that user roles which, by definition, can change availability are allowed to do it.

name: test_can_change_device_status
docstring: Ensure that user roles which, by definition, can change status are allowed to do it.

name: test_can_get_runcard
docstring: Check certain users can get all runcards

name: test_can_list_runcards
docstring: Check certain users can list all runcards

name: test_can_list_saved_experiments
docstring: Test user roles that are allowed to list saved experiments can do it -- e.g admin and qili-user

name: test_can_save_and_delete_owned_runcards
docstring: Check all users can save runcard delete their runcards except for admin who can delete of all them.

name: test_can_save_get_and_update_owned_runcards
docstring: Check certain users can update their own runcards

name: test_can_save_runcard
docstring: Check certain users cannot save runcards

name: test_can_select_device
docstring: Test every user can select the devices to which it has access

name: test_cannot_change_device_availability
docstring: Ensure that user roles which, by definition, cannot change availability are not allowed to do it

name: test_cannot_change_device_availability_when_online
docstring: Ensure tany user can block any device when status is not maintenance

name: test_cannot_change_device_status
docstring: Ensure that user roles which, by definition, cannot change status are not allowed to do it.

name: test_cannot_change_device_status_when_blocked
docstring: Ensure any user role can change device status when device availabiliyty is not available

name: test_cannot_delete_any_runcard
docstring: Check certain users  cannot delete any runcard

name: test_cannot_delete_not_owned_runcard
docstring: Check users cannot delete runcards from other users, in particular, admin.

name: test_cannot_get_runcard
docstring: Check certain users cannot get runcards

name: test_cannot_list_runcards
docstring: Check certain users cannot list runcards

name: test_cannot_list_saved_experiments
docstring: Test user roles that aren't allowed to list saved experiments can do it -- e.g bsc

name: test_cannot_post_experiment
docstring: Test user roles that aren't allowed to post experiments can do it -- e.g bsc

name: test_cannot_save_runcard
docstring: Check certain users cannot save runcards

name: test_cannot_update_any_runcards
docstring: Check certain users can update their own runcards

name: test_cannot_update_not_owned_runcards
docstring: Check users who are allowed to update runcards can only update theirs

name: test_list_jobs
docstring: Test that users can see only their saved experiments

name: test_post_get_and_delete_job
docstring: Post a circuit and get all its data

name: test_check_all_test_jobs_and_runcards_deleted
docstring: Count number jobs and runcards before running the test suite

name: test_store_initial_job_and_runcard_count
docstring: Count number jobs and runcards before running the test suite

name: test_all_circuits
docstring: Test whether all circuits can be sent in a single job and then its result can be retrieved, for each device. This is the real user case. Note that this only considers ONLINE and AVAILABLE devices. Should be run with qili-admin-test user.

name: test_five_qubit_500_gates_circuit
docstring: Test whether a five-qubit 500 gates circuit can be sent and then its result can be retrieved, for each device. This is the real user case. Note that this only considers ONLINE and AVAILABLE devices. Should be run with qili-admin-test user.

name: test_one_qubit_500_gates_circuit
docstring: Test whether a one-qubit 500 gates circuit can be sent and then its result can be retrieved, for each device. This is the real user case. Note that this only considers ONLINE and AVAILABLE devices. Should be run with qili-admin-test user.

name: test_two_qubit_500_gates_circuit
docstring: Test whether a two-qubit 500 gates circuit can be sent and then its result can be retrieved, for each device. This is the real user case. Note that this only considers ONLINE and AVAILABLE devices. Should be run with qili-admin-test user.
